Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Hogwash \Hog"wash`\, n. 1. Swill. --Arbuthnot. [1913 Webster]
2. Meaningless talk; nonsense; balderdash; bunk; -- also used as an interjection, expressing scornful disbelief. [PJC]
hogwash n : unacceptable behavior (especially ludicrously false statements) [syn: {bunk}, {bunkum}, {buncombe}, {guff}, {rot}]
